title: Omar's notebook
stack: Handmade! (backend is Django, each post is an HTML page, with some emojis at the top of each file to mark what category it's in, which the server reads before serving)
description: I started this blog because I wanted to create a little corner for myself on the internet where I can talk about things I'm learning in a way that I can share with friends. I was inspired by others I saw who have a "notebook" instead of a "blog" because that feels less serious, like the posts don't have to be perfect, and that makes it easier for me to write and share
